content.title: Genetic Engineering
content.statement: Genetic Engineering is a fundamental concept in science biology that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics.

explanation.intuition: Understanding Genetic Engineering helps build foundational knowledge in this domain.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of Genetic Engineering include the core principles and their practical applications.
explanation.technical_details: Technical implementation involves applying the core principles of Genetic Engineering to real-world scenarios.
